::: entry-content
Unlock Bootloader of Huawei for Free using an Unofficial method. This
easy steps guide will assist you in downloading Huawei bootloader unlock
tool. Almost every Android OEM company releases its smartphones with a
locked bootloader.

But if you want to root Android, install TWRP or CWM custom recovery,
flash custom ROM like LineageOS, you must unlock the bootloader. Android
phones like Samsung, Motorola, OnePlus, and Google can be modified
easily.

It is possible to root these smartphones or install a custom ROM. But
unfortunately, companies like Huawei are not friendly towards
customization or modifications. The bootloader is a code or program that
runs when you boot up your Android phone.

It consists of instructions to start the operating system RAM and
kernel. Device manufacturers lock bootloaders to make sure that users
stick to their official Stock ROM. Unfortunately, Huawei has officially
closed the bootloader unlocking process from 25th July
2018.[]{#ezoic-pub-ad-placeholder-651

## [What is DC-Unlocker?]{#What_is_DC-Unlocker}

Here, we'll answer your question of How to unlock a Huawei android
device's bootloader without an unlock code. Till last year, Huawei used
to provide bootloader unlock code from their official EMUI website.

However, users noticed many issues after unlocking the bootloader. Some
of which were a system failure, boot loops, increased power consumption,
etc. There are many advantages and disadvantages of unlocking
bootloaders on Android.

The main benefits of bootloader unlocking are rooting, flashing custom
ROM, and installing mods like Magisk, Xposed, SuperSU, etc. The
disadvantages include the warranty getting void, chances of bricked
devices, and problems in receiving official software updates.

There are many third-party services to unlock the bootloader of your
device. But unfortunately, these are paid services and priced from 20\$
to 50\$ to get the bootloader to unlock the code.

**Also Read:** [10 Best Spider-Man Games for
Android](https://www.droidthunder.com/spiderman-games-android/)

Some of these paid services include FunkyHuawei, Ministry of Solutions,
and Global Unlocking Solutions. You can either provide them your mobile
IMEI number or model, serial number, and firmware, and they usually send
the unlock code through email.

:::

Internet, but most of them are spam or viruses. Here we will use
DC-unlocker 2 client crack version to unlock the bootloader of Huawei
devices.

## [How to Unlock Bootloader of Huawei and Honor Phones]{#How_to_Unlock_Bootloader_of_Huawei_and_Honor_Phones}

With this guide, you can unlock the bootloader of Huawei P9, Huawei P10,
Huawei Mate X, Huawei Mate 20 Pro, and Huawei Mate 10 Pro, etc. Besides,
you can also unlock the bootloader of Honor 7x, Honor 8x, Honor 9n,
Honor View 20, Honor Note 10, etc.

[]{.ezoic-autoinsert-ad .ezoic-mid_content}

This DC-unlocker crack version is entirely free and provides unlimited
credits. That means this tool will give you a dc unlocker username and
password with credits. Proceed ahead to Huawei and Honor bootloader
unlock guide below.

### [Disclaimer]{#Disclaimer}

This process will void your device warranty. Proceed at your own risk.
We at Droid Thunder will not be held responsible for damaged/bricked
phones by referring to this guide.

### [Requirements]{#Requirements}

-   Charge your phone to a minimum of 50%.
-   Back up your contacts, apps, call logs, notes, etc., for safety.
-   Install the latest Huawei [USB
    drivers](https://www.droidthunder.com/usb-drivers/) on your
    computer.
-   Also, install [ADB
    drivers](https://www.droidthunder.com/adb-drivers/) on your PC.
-   Enable [USB
    Debugging](https://www.droidthunder.com/enable-usb-debugging/) and
    unlock OEM from device settings.

After doing everything mentioned above, let's start the process to
unlock the bootloader of Huawei phones.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22400%22%20height=%22495%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24153 loading="lazy" width="400" height="495"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-Unlocker-screenshot-12-1.jpg 400w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-Unlocker-screenshot-12-1-242x300.jpg 242w"
sizes="(max-width: 400px) 100vw, 400px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-Unlocker-screenshot-12-1.jpg"}
:::

-   Then, select the *Read Bootloader Code* option.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22400%22%20height=%22496%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24154 loading="lazy" width="400" height="496"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-read-bootloader-code-screenshot-13-1.jpg 400w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-read-bootloader-code-screenshot-13-1-242x300.jpg 242w"
sizes="(max-width: 400px) 100vw, 400px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-read-bootloader-code-screenshot-13-1.jpg"}
:::

-   Wait until the bootloader code generates.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22400%22%20height=%22496%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24155 loading="lazy" width="400" height="496"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-read-bootloader-code-screenshot-14-1.jpg 400w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-read-bootloader-code-screenshot-14-1-242x300.jpg 242w"
sizes="(max-width: 400px) 100vw, 400px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-read-bootloader-code-screenshot-14-1.jpg"}
:::

-   After the DC-Unlocker tool generates bootloader code, copy it, and
    save it in a Notepad file.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22450%22%20height=%22223%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24156 loading="lazy" width="450" height="223"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-bootloader-code-screenshot-15-1.jpg 450w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-bootloader-code-screenshot-15-1-300x149.jpg 300w"
sizes="(max-width: 450px) 100vw, 450px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-bootloader-code-screenshot-15-1.jpg"}
:::

-   Disconnect your phone from the PC by safely removing the USB cable.
-   Download [Huawei Unlock
    Bootloader.zip](https://www.mediafire.com/file/qhketcsmnwcb327/Official-Unlock-Bootloader-Huawei-Honor.zip/file).
-   Extract the zip file. You'll see the following files after
    extraction:

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22280%22%20height=%22106%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24157 loading="lazy" width="280" height="106"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloaderof-Huawei-zip-package-screenshot-16.jpg"}
:::

-   Power off your phone and boot it into Fastboot mode.
-   For that, press and hold the *Volume down key + Power button*
    simultaneously until fast boot mode appears.
-   Keeping the mobile in fast boot mode, connect it to the PC using a
    USB cable.
-   Now, double-click the *Unlock-Bootloader.bat* file.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22280%22%20height=%22111%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24158 loading="lazy" width="280" height="111"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-zip-package-screenshot-17-1.jpg"}
:::

-   The following cmd window will appear:

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22550%22%20height=%22277%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24159 loading="lazy" width="550" height="277"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-18-1.jpg 550w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-18-1-300x151.jpg 300w"
sizes="(max-width: 550px) 100vw, 550px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-18-1.jpg"}
:::

-   Firstly, it will ask you to choose a language. So type *2* for
    English and press the Enter key.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22550%22%20height=%22277%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24160 loading="lazy" width="550" height="277"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-19-1.jpg 550w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-19-1-300x151.jpg 300w"
sizes="(max-width: 550px) 100vw, 550px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-19-1.jpg"}
:::

-   On the next screen, it will confirm whether phone drivers are
    installed or not.
-   So hit the enter key to continue.
-   Again hit the Enter key.
-   Now it will ask you to type the code which you've received earlier.
-   So type the bootloader unlock code and press the Enter key.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22550%22%20height=%22277%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24161 loading="lazy" width="550" height="277"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-20-1.jpg 550w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-20-1-300x151.jpg 300w"
sizes="(max-width: 550px) 100vw, 550px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-20-1.jpg"}
:::

-   Type *Y* to confirm that you've entered the bootloader unlock code
    correctly. Then hit the Enter key.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22550%22%20height=%22277%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24162 loading="lazy" width="550" height="277"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-21-1.jpg 550w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-21-1-300x151.jpg 300w"
sizes="(max-width: 550px) 100vw, 550px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-21-1.jpg"}
:::

-   Again press Enter to start the bootloader unlocking process.
-   Be patient and wait until the process to unlock the bootloader of
    the Huawei Honor phone completes.

::: wp-block-image
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width=%22550%22%20height=%22277%22%3E%3C/svg%3E){.ezlazyload
.wp-image-24163 loading="lazy" width="550" height="277"
ezsrcset="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-22-1.jpg 550w,https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-22-1-300x151.jpg 300w"
sizes="(max-width: 550px) 100vw, 550px"
ezimgfmt="rs rscb79 src ng ngcb79 srcset"
ezsrc="https://www.droidthunder.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/Unlock-Bootloader-of-Huawei-DC-unlocker-cmd-window-screenshot-22-1.jpg"}
:::

## [Wrapping Up]{#Wrapping_Up}

Finally! This is how you can Unlock the Bootloader of Huawei and Honor
phones. Please feel free to comment below your queries or suggestions
related to this tutorial.
